content.rendered:
portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk respects the intellectual property rights of others. Per the DMCA, portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement on the Site if submitted to portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk’s Copyright Agent as described below. Upon receipt of a notice alleging copyright infringement, portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk will take whatever action it deems appropriate within its sole discretion, including removal of the allegedly infringing materials and termination of access for repeat infringers of copyright protected content.

The phrase NFR is a registered trademark owned and licensed by the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo.
portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk is not affiliated with, supported or endorsed by the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo in any way. Our use of the term is for informational purposes only.

If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated by portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk or by a third party who has uploaded materials to our website, please provide the following information to the designated Copyright Agent listed below:

  • A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed;
  • A description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Site;
  • An address, telephone number, and email address where we can contact you and, if different, an email address where the alleged infringing party, if not portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk, can contact you;
  • A statement that you have a good-faith belief that the use is not authorized by the copyright owner or other intellectual property rights owner, by its agent, or by law;
  • A statement by you under penalty of perjury that the information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual property owner or are authorized to act on the owner’s behalf;
  • Your electronic or physical signature.

portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk may request additional information before removing any allegedly infringing material. In the event portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk removes the allegedly infringing materials, portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk will immediately notify the person responsible for posting such materials that portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk removed or disabled access to the materials. portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk may also provide the responsible person with your email address so that the person may respond to your allegations.

The statement of complaint that you provide us, containing all of the above information, should be sent to our Designated Copyright Agent by post, fax or email to one of the respective contact addresses below:

dmca@portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk

Please also note that under applicable law, 17 U.S.C. 512(f), any person who knowingly materially misrepresents that material or activity is infringing may be subject to liability.
